insights.root_cause: Frequent fluctuations in transaction amounts or posting errors.
insights.recommendation: Review transaction history and verify posting accuracy.

insights.bucket_description: No clear pattern, but deviation exceeds threshold
insights.root_cause: Irregular transactions or atypical account activity.
insights.recommendation: Conduct a detailed audit to identify unusual transactions.

insights.bucket_description: Consistent increase or decrease in outstanding balances
insights.root_cause: Systematic errors in billing or payment processes.
insights.recommendation: Examine billing and payment processes for errors.

insights.root_cause: Manual corrections or reversals of previous entries.
insights.recommendation: Review correction entries for appropriateness and accuracy.

insights.bucket_description: Outstanding balances are not in line with previous months
insights.root_cause: Changes in business operations or accounting errors.
insights.recommendation: Compare current balances with historical data for discrepancies.

insights.bucket_description: Gradual deviation beyond threshold over multiple periods
insights.root_cause: Cumulative errors or overlooked adjustments over time.
insights.recommendation: Analyze long-term trends and investigate gradual changes.

insights.bucket_description: High volatility in account balances over time
insights.recommendation: Monitor account closely and establish volatility thresholds.
